issue.title: tor.link
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [NSFW] [https://tor.link/site/securedrop-cbc/info](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Ftor.link%2Fsite%2Fsecuredrop-cbc%2Finfo) ### Comment > Various banners on various pages on the site, with almost all of those banners being ads for drugs, such that I marked this report as NSFW just in case despite this particular example page having no porn on it.
